name: EverChain
description: EverChain is an all-in-one decentralized cryptocurrency platform. EverChain provides a comprehensive list of features including a staking platform with high APY, a reliable swap with the some of the lowest fees. Investors in $EC receive rewards in BUSD simply by owning and holding an EverChain token. The decentralised app of EverChain, provides the ability to stake your tokens, to increase your holdings in $EC as well as tracking your BUSD rewards.
